title: What are some things only the president would say? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Assuming you are referring to Trump™ … “I’m a very stable genius.” “I know more about (x) than (y)” (Insert any nouns and/or names you like) “Grab ’em by the pu**y.” And myriad others. In essence, think of something you would not say, and chances are he already has.
“I want a wall!” “Give me a wall!” “China has a wall!” “Even Britain has a wall - I think some guy called Hadrian built it?” “So why can’t I not have a wall?” and so on until the cows come home!
